segments.text: What is the proper way to handle a napkin at dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ordinarily , as soon as you are seated , you put your napkin on your lap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about at a formal dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At a formal dinner , you wait for your hostess to put hers on her lap first .
segments.speaker: S2
